dcterms:description: The LERF-MASK dataset is utilized for evaluating segmentation quality and fine-grained localization accuracy in open-world 3D scenes, providing ground truth mask labels for various text queries.

dcterms:description: Mip-Nerf360 is used for evaluating the performance of 3D reconstruction methods, particularly in unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields.

dcterms:description: The LERF dataset is referenced for visual comparison in the context of 3D scene reconstruction and segmentation tasks.

dcterms:description: The Tanks&Temples dataset is used for benchmarking large-scale scene reconstruction, providing diverse 3D scene cases for visual comparison.
